subject: How to create data-driven tests?
msgSnippet: Hi Guys, Are there any methods in JUnit using which one testcase can be executed repeatedly with different data sets as inputs? These datasets and the expected
messageBody:
Hi Guys,

Are there any methods in JUnit using which one testcase can be
executed repeatedly with different data sets as inputs? These
datasets and the expected results are to be imported from and Access
Database.

Thanks in advance,

Vibha
